name: Viriot -Virus Riot
description:
2D Shooter Game Written in C++ with SDL

Game Synopsis: Pandemic ravaged the world. ViRiot, a special taskforce built to suppress the spread of virus was established. Equipped with advanced technology, they can infiltrate infected human bodies to kill viruses.

As an elite officer of ViRiot, you're tasked to suppress the spread of viruses inside the body. An advanced submarine equipped with disinfectant weapons is your partner in exterminating the endless army of viruses.
